Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on the busiest intersection in Highlands Ranch at the NWC of Broadway & Highlands Ranch Parkway
SEC Coal Mine & Pierce in Littleton, CO

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Coal Mine Shopping Center has a complementary host of national and local retailers, restaurants and service providers. It is surrounded by a dense residential area and nearby public schools that it serves without competition at its intersection.

This shopping center is located in the heart of the southwest regional mall area. Proven retail location with excellent demographics. Surrounding retail stores include Lowe's, Home Depot, American Furniture Warehouse, Best Buy, REI, Walmart, Sam's Club & Target. Don't miss out on the last vacant space!
